title: Jedi Master
data:
[![Wikipedia](/images/thumb/f/f8/Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png/50px-Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png)](/wiki/File:Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png "Wikipedia")

[Wikipedia](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page "wikipedia:Main Page") has an article about:

***[Jedi Master](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:Search/Jedi_Master "wikipedia:Special:Search/Jedi Master")***

|                           |                                                                                     |

| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |

|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                                                                                     |

| **[Frequency](/wiki/Monster_frequency "Monster frequency")** (by [normal means](/wiki/Normal_mechanism "Normal mechanism"))                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | 0 (Not randomly generated)                                                          |

| **[Resistances](/wiki/Resistance "Resistance")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | None                                                                                |

|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                                                                                     |
| The Jedi Master:* has [a head, a couple of arms, and a torso](/wiki/Humanoid "Humanoid").
* is [omnivorous](/wiki/Omnivore "Omnivore").
* is not a valid [polymorphable](/wiki/Polymorph "Polymorph") form.
* is a [human](/wiki/Human_\(monster_attribute\) "Human (monster attribute)").
* is male.
* is normally generated [peaceful](/wiki/Peaceful "Peaceful").
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* can pick up weapons and food.
* can pick up [magical items](/wiki/Magical_item "Magical item").
* lets you close unless attacked.
* [never leaves a corpse](/wiki/Corpseless "Corpseless"). |                                                                                     |

The **Jedi Master** is a [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") added in the [Jedi patch](/wiki/Jedi "Jedi"), which is included in [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM").[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)

The Jedi Master is the [Jedi](/wiki/Jedi_quest "Jedi quest") [quest leader](/wiki/Quest_leader "Quest leader"). He appears in the center room of the [home level](/wiki/Home_level "Home level"), accompanied by four [padawan](/wiki/Padawan "Padawan").

The Jedi Master [is generated with](/wiki/Monster_starting_inventory "Monster starting inventory") a blue [lightsaber](/wiki/Lightsaber "Lightsaber"), [speed boots](/wiki/Speed_boots "Speed boots"), and an [amulet of reflection](/wiki/Amulet_of_reflection "Amulet of reflection").

"Jedi Master" is also the rank title for a [Jedi](/wiki/Jedi "Jedi") player at experience level 18 and above.

## References

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [Benjamin Schieder's Jedi Patch](http://www.benjamin-schieder.de/downloads/slashem/slashem_jedi_0.5.patch)
html:
Jedi Master

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
Wikipedia has an article about:
Jedi Master
@ Jedi Master (No tile)
Attacks Weapon 1d6 physical, weapon 1d6 physical
@ Jedi Master (No tile)
Attacks

Weapon 1d6 physical, weapon 1d6 physical

Base level 20

Speed 18
Base AC -5
Base MR 50
Alignment 10 (lawful)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable No
Weight 1450
Nutritional value 400
Size medium
Resistances None
Resistances conveyed None

The Jedi Master:

  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is a human.
  • is male.
  • is normally generated peaceful.
  • is strong.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • can pick up magical items.
  • lets you close unless attacked.
  • never leaves a corpse.

The Jedi Master is a monster added in the Jedi patch, which is included in SlashTHEM.[1]

The Jedi Master is the Jedi quest leader. He appears in the center room of the home level, accompanied by four padawan.

The Jedi Master is generated with a blue lightsaber, speed boots, and an amulet of reflection.

"Jedi Master" is also the rank title for a Jedi player at experience level 18 and above.

References

  1. ↑ Benjamin Schieder's Jedi Patch

The '''Jedi Master''' is a [[monster]] added in the [[Jedi|Jedi patch]], which is included in [[SlashTHEM]].<ref>[http://www.benjamin-schieder.de/downloads/slashem/slashem_jedi_0.5.patch Benjamin Schieder's Jedi Patch]</ref>

The Jedi Master is the [[Jedi quest|Jedi]] [[quest leader]].  He appears in the center room of the [[home level]], accompanied by four [[padawan]].

The Jedi Master [[Monster starting inventory|is generated with]] a blue [[lightsaber]], [[speed boots]], and an [[amulet of reflection]].

"Jedi Master" is also the rank title for a [[Jedi]] player at experience level 18 and above.
